ProjectTitle: Integrating Multi-Disciplinary Expertise in a Learning and Adaptive European Pandemic Preparedness System
InitialFeedbackHistory:
22/04/2024
You now used the Flemish DMP template, the European Commission has their own template with a strong focus on the FAIR principles which are mandatory to follow in all HE funded projects; you can reuse most of the current DMP, but detailed information on how you will make your data Findable, Accessible, Interoperable and Reusable needs to be added. 
You can find the EU template in DMPonline.be when selecting the European Commission as funder; or as word file on the website of the European Commission: https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/how-to-participate/reference-documents?programmePeriod=2021-2027&frameworkProgramme=43108390 under templates and forms, project reporting templates
For more information you are welcome to attent our training "Research Data Management for EU Projects" tomorrow (april 23) at 15.00h see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/training/funder-rdm-requirements/write-dmp/events/RDM-HE-Apr2024; or have a look at our website: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/funder; you can find example DMPs for HE in the DMP monitoring tool: https://www.groupware.kuleuven.be/sites/dmpmt/Pages/Search/SearchExamples.aspx#
label: good with suggestions
